history.proof: intros a1 l l1 H1 H2. shelve.

ctx: intros a1 l l1 H1 H2.
intros a1 l l1 H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type empty : A eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} a1 : A l, l1 : list bool H1 : ~ is_prefix l l1 H2 : ~ is_prefix l1 l Unable to unify "~ is_prefix l l1" with "pbfree l (pbadd a1 (pbleaf empty) l1)".

ctx: intros a1 l l1 H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Not an inductive goal with 1 constructor.

ctx: intros a1 l l1 H1 H2.
intros a1 l l1 H1 H2.

chat.content:
A: Type
empty: A
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}
============================
forall (a1 : A) (l l1 : list bool), ~ is_prefix l l1 -> ~ is_prefix l1 l -> pbfree l (pbadd a1 (pbleaf empty) l1)

Related definitions and lemmas:
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
pbadd = fix pbadd (a : A) (t : pbtree) (l : list bool) {struct l} : pbtree := match l with | nil => pbleaf a | true :: l1 => match t with | pbleaf _ => pbright (pbadd a (pbleaf empty) l1) | pbleft t1 => pbnode t1 (pbadd a (pbleaf empty) l1) | pbright t2 => pbright (pbadd a t2 l1) | pbnode t1 t2 => pbnode t1 (pbadd a t2 l1) end | false :: l1 => match t with | pbleaf _ => pbleft (pbadd a (pbleaf empty) l1) | pbleft t1 => pbleft (pbadd a t1 l1) | pbright t2 => pbnode (pbadd a (pbleaf empty) l1) t2 | pbnode
Inductive pbfree : list bool -> pbtree -> Prop := pbfree_left1 : forall (b : pbtree) (l : list bool), pbfree (true :: l) (pbleft b) | pbfree_left2 : forall (b : pbtree) (l : list bool), pbfree l b -> pbfree (false :: l) (pbleft b) | pbfree_right1 : forall (b : pbtree) (l : list bool), pbfree (false :: l) (pbright b) | pbfree_right2 : forall (b : pbtree) (l : list bool), pbfree l b -> pbfree (true :: l) (pbright b) | pbfree_node1 : forall (b c : pbtree) (l : list bool), pbfree l b -> pbfree (false :: l) (pbnode b c) | pbfree_node2 : forall (b c : pbtree) (l : list bool), pbfree l b
Inductive pbtree : Type := pbleaf : A -> pbtree | pbleft : pbtree -> pbtree | pbright : pbtree -> pbtree | pbnode : pbtree -> pbtree -> pbtree
Inductive is_prefix : list bool -> list bool -> Prop := prefixNull : forall l : list bool, is_prefix nil l | prefixCons : forall (b : bool) (l1 l2 : list bool), is_prefix l1 l2 -> is_prefix (b :: l1) (b :: l2) Arguments is_prefix (_ _)%list_scope Arguments prefixNull _%list_scope Arguments prefixCons _%bool_scope (_ _)%list_scope
pbadd_prop2 : forall (a1 : A) (l1 : list bool) (l2 : pbtree), pbfree l1 l2 -> permutation (compute_pbcode (pbadd a1 l2 l1)) ((a1, l1) :: compute_pbcode l2)
is_prefix_ind : forall P : list bool -> list bool -> Prop, (forall l : list bool, P nil l) -> (forall (b : bool) (l1 l2 : list bool), is_prefix l1 l2 -> P l1 l2 -> P (b :: l1) (b :: l2)) -> forall l l0 : list bool, is_prefix l l0 -> P l l0
is_prefix_sind : forall P : list bool -> list bool -> SProp, (forall l : list bool, P nil l) -> (forall (b : bool) (l1 l2 : list bool), is_prefix l1 l2 -> P l1 l2 -> P (b :: l1) (b :: l2)) -> forall l l0 : list bool, is_prefix l l0 -> P l l0
prefixCons : forall (b : bool) (l1 l2 : list bool), is_prefix l1 l2 -> is_prefix (b :: l1) (b :: l2)
permutation_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall l1 l2 : list A, {permutation l1 l2} + {~ permutation l1 l2}
pbadd_prop1 : forall (a1 a2 : A) (l1 : list bool), compute_pbcode (pbadd a1 (pbleaf a2) l1) = (a1, l1) :: nil
number_of_occurrences_O : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (l : list A), ~ In a l -> number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a l = 0
pb_unique_prefix1 : forall (t : pbtree) (a1 a2 : A) (lb1 lb2 : list bool), In (a1, lb1) (compute_pbcode t) -> In (a2, lb2) (compute_pbcode t) -> is_prefix lb1 lb2 -> a1 = a2
number_of_occurrences_permutation : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (l1 l2 : list A) (a : A), permutation l1 l2 -> number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a l1 = number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a l2
unique_prefix1 : forall (A : Type) (c : code A) (a1 a2 : A) (lb1 lb2 : list bool), unique_prefix c -> In (a1, lb1) c -> In (a2, lb2) c -> is_prefix lb1 lb2 -> a1 = a2
btree_unique_prefix1 : forall (A : Type) (t : btree A) (a1 a2 : A) (lb1 lb2 : list bool), In (a1, lb1) (compute_code t) -> In (a2, lb2) (compute_code t) -> is_prefix lb1 lb2 -> a1 = a2
add_frequency_list_in_inv : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a1 a2 : A) (b1 : nat) (l : list (A * nat)), In (a1, b1) (add_frequency_list eqA_dec a2 l) -> a1 = a2 \/ In (a1, b1) l
code_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall (c : code A) (a : A), {exists l : list bool, In (a, l) c} + {forall l : list bool, ~ In (a, l) c}
not_in_find_code : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (l : list (A * list bool)), (forall p : list bool, ~ In (a, p) l) -> find_code eqA_dec a l = nil
find_code_correct2 : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (c : code A) (a : A) (l : list bool), unique_key c -> In (a, l) c -> find_code eqA_dec a c = l
permutation_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), P nil nil -> (forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> P l2 l1 -> P (a :: l2) (a :: l1)) -> (forall (a b : A) (l : list A), P (a :: b :: l) (b :: a :: l)) -> (forall l1 l2 l3 : list A, permutation l1 l2 -> P l1 l2 -> permutation l2 l3 -> P l2 l3 -> P l1 l3) -> forall l l0 : list A, permutation l l0 -> P l l0
encode_cons_inv : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (l1 : list bool) (l : list (A * list bool)) (m1 : list A), ~ In a m1 -> encode eqA_dec ((a, l1) :: l) m1 = encode eqA_dec l m1
pbfree_ind : forall P : list bool -> pbtree -> Prop, (forall (b : pbtree) (l : list bool), P (true :: l) (pbleft b)) -> (forall (b : pbtree) (l : list bool), pbfree l b -> P l b -> P (false :: l) (pbleft b)) -> (forall (b : pbtree) (l : list bool), P (false :: l) (pbright b)) -> (forall (b : pbtree) (l : list bool), pbfree l b -> P l b -> P (true :: l) (pbright b)) -> (forall (b c : pbtree) (l : list bool), pbfree l b -> P l b -> P (false :: l) (pbnode b c)) -> (forall (b c : pbtree) (l : list bool), pbfree l b -> P l b -> P (true :: l) (pbnode c b)) ->...-> P l p
pbfree_sind : forall P : list bool -> pbtree -> SProp, (forall (b : pbtree) (l : list bool), P (true :: l) (pbleft b)) -> (forall (b : pbtree) (l : list bool), pbfree l b -> P l b -> P (false :: l) (pbleft b)) -> (forall (b : pbtree) (l : list bool), P (false :: l) (pbright b)) -> (forall (b : pbtree) (l : list bool), pbfree l b -> P l b -> P (true :: l) (pbright b)) -> (forall (b c : pbtree) (l : list bool), pbfree l b -> P l b -> P (false :: l) (pbnode b c)) -> (forall (b c : pbtree) (l : list bool), pbfree l b -> P l b -> P (true :: l) (pbnode c b)) ->...-> P l p
find_code_correct1 : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (c : code A) (a : A) (b : bool) (l : list bool), find_code eqA_dec a c = b :: l -> In (a, b :: l) c
ulist_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall l : list A, {ulist l} + {~ ulist l}
cover_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (t : btree A), {cover l t} + {~ cover l t}
not_in_find_map : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (p : list (A * list bool)) (a : A) (b : bool), (forall l : list bool, ~ In (a, l) p) -> find_code eqA_dec a (map (fun v : A * list bool => let (a1, b1) := v in (a1, b :: b1)) p) = nil
pbfree_right2 : forall (b : pbtree) (l : list bool), pbfree l b -> pbfree (true :: l) (pbright b)
pbfree_left2 : forall (b : pbtree) (l : list bool), pbfree l b -> pbfree (false :: l) (pbleft b)
add_frequency_list_unique_key : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (l : list (A * nat)), unique_key l -> unique_key (add_frequency_list eqA_dec a l)
in_frequency_map : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (l : list A) (a : A), In a l -> In a (map fst (frequency_list eqA_dec l))
in_frequency_map_inv : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (l : list A) (a : A), In a (map fst (frequency_list eqA_dec l)) -> In a l
add_frequency_list_1 : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (l : list (A * nat)), (forall ca : nat, ~ In (a, ca) l) -> In (a, 1) (add_frequency_list eqA_dec a l)
pbfree_node1 : forall (b c : pbtree) (l : list bool), pbfree l b -> pbfree (false :: l) (pbnode b c)

```intros a1 l l1 H1 H2. unfold not. intros H3 H4. apply H1. split.
+ intro H5. apply H3. apply prefix_transitivity with (l1:=l); assumption.
+ intro H6. apply H4. apply prefix_transitivity with (l1:=l1); assumption.```

original: intros a1 l l1 H1 H2. unfold not. intros H3 H4. apply H1. split. + intro H5. apply H3. apply prefix_transitivity with (l1:=l); auto. + intro H6. apply H4. apply prefix_transitivity with (l1:=l1); auto.
